fi.tiko.eatnyeet

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite
      • fi.tiko.eatnyeet.GameObject
        • fi.tiko.eatnyeet.Character

  • public class Character
extends GameObject
    Main character for the game, only create one of these.

      • move

        public void move()
        Moves character, this is called in update and checks user inputs. Both mobile and keyboard support.

      • onCollision

        public void onCollision(Contact contact,
                        GameObject other)
        When 2 bodies collides, onCollision is automatically called. Overide onCollision to do class spesific tasks. When character collides with object, it checks if its something it should pick up, if not then it will not do anything.
        Overrides:
        onCollision in class GameObject
        Parameters:
        contact -
        other - can be used to check what class it is colliding with
